summary: The Degrees Not Debt Act of 2025 aims to increase the maximum Federal Pell Grant. For award years 2026-2027 and 2027-2028, the maximum grant is set to $14,800, reduced by the amount specified in the relevant appropriations act. For subsequent years, the $14,800 amount is adjusted based on the Consumer Price Index. The bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to define the 'annual adjustment percentage' and establishes a July 1, 2026 effective date.
